episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_03:
O-oh, not at all. These people were saying they
needed some a-advice...
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_05:
We’d like to get our mentors a gift to thank them
for all they’ve done for us.
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_06:
They really like sweets, so we wanted to find
an extra-special treat for them...
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_07:
But we’re not confident that what we’d choose
would be good enough!
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_08:
We figured since you ladies are used to fancy
things, you might know where we can find sweets
that aren’t just the ordinary sort.
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_09:
Oh dear. I’m a-afraid I’m not so familiar with
sweets myself...
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_10: I see. Thanks for explaining the situation.
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_11: It’s true that we might be able to help you.
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_12:
But that means we’d be letting you in on our
most exclusive dessert spots!
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_13:
To be honest, it’ll take more than just a request to
get us to spill our secrets like that.
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_17:
Would you help us train by being our opponents
in battle?
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_18:
I wouldn’t mind sharing my go-to spots if you’re 
able to make the battle interesting for us.
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_21:
I’m not nearly as strong as the two of you, but I’m
no slouch when it comes to sweets!
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_24:
What we look for in our opponents is
superb strength...
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4001_1001_25:
So make your best effort not to bore me with a
yawn-inducing battle. Clear?
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4002_1001_01:
Thank you for all you’ve done as our mentors!
We have some presents for you!
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4002_1001_14:
It looks so elegant and tasty! Thank you for the
lovely gift!
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4002_1001_03:
I don’t think I’ve ever seen this before. Where’d
you find it?
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4002_1001_04:
We went through intense training with some fancy
ladies so they’d tell us all about their super-secret
dessert spots!
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4002_1001_05:
Yeah! They may look proper and well-mannered,
but that training was super vicious!
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4002_1001_06:
*chuckle* Is that so? Well, as long as it was
training, I’m sure you’re stronger for it.
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4002_1001_08:
When you asked them for advice, you didn’t tell
them who you were getting these for, did you?!
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4002_1001_09: Oh, not to worry! We didn’t give them any names.
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4002_1001_11:
Haha! We athletes need to be careful about our
public image. It’s pretty hard to hide my sweet
tooth, though!
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4002_1001_12:
I’m not really hiding mine... Though I guess
people’d be surprised to hear I like sweets.
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4002_1001_13:
Let’s just keep that a secret, then. Come on!
Let’s dig in!
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4003_1001_01:
After all that, I wonder who those sweets
were for.
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4003_1001_02: Didn’t they mention something about muscles?
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4003_1001_03:
Mhm. I suppose those mentors weren’t just
mentoring them in battles.
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4003_1001_04:
The only one I know who fits that profile
is Bruno...
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4003_1001_05: I think Bea’s also got a sweet tooth.
episode_event_lady_sweets01/4003_1001_07:
*chuckle* You’d never know that those three
actually love sweets, despite all appearances!
